Class Ogre

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.Character
      • dkeep.logic.Ogre
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Ogre
extends Character
implements java.io.Serializable
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ogre(int x, int y, char Elm, char attackElm)
      Constructor of an Ogre, an Ogre is a Character so the it uses the Character constructor and and set the Club in the Ogre position

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds the ogre club position into a map and the ogre itself
      int[] ChangeClub()
      Randomly generates the new Club's position considering as start point the actual Ogre's position
      void decStopOgre()
      Decrements by one de counter stopmove that defines that the ogre is stunned

      Generate a Random move to the Ogre
      int getAttackX()
      Gets the current x position of the ogre club attack

      Gets the current y position of the ogre club attack
      char getClubElm()
      Gets the current symbol that represents the club in the game map
      int getStopOgre()
      Gets the current value of the counter that defines the number of turns that the ogre is left to be stunned

      Sets the x and y club position with the given parameters

      Sets a new symbol to represent the club
      void setStopOgre(int times)
      Sets the counter time of when the ogre gets stuned by the hero to its given parameter
      boolean update(Map currentmap, char guardmove)
      Updates the ogre and club positions by randomly simulating new movements until the new positions are valid (a max of 50 tries in case something goes wrong) Only updates the ogre ( or tries to) if the ogre is not stunned
      void updateClub(Map currentmap)
      Updates the ogres club positions by randomly getting new adjacent positions to the ogre (after he moved) until the position is valid ( 50 tries atmost if something goes wrong) also updates the club symbol accordingly (in case it goes over a key, for example)
      boolean updateSleep()
      Updates the sleeping(stun) status of the ogre by updating the sleeping count timer, the ogre and club elements
      boolean verifyColision(Character c)
      Compares if an ogre and the club attack is next to another Character and updates the ogre accordingly Checks if the Ogre is not stunned and then compares if the Character c is next to it , if so the the ogre is set to stunned accordingly Also checks if the character is next to the ogre attack club

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ogre

        public Ogre(int x,
            int y,
            char Elm,
            char attackElm)
        Constructor of an Ogre, an Ogre is a Character so the it uses the Character constructor and and set the Club in the Ogre position
        Parameters:
        x - Ogre/Club start matrix line
        y - Ogre/Club start matrix column
        Elm - char that represents Ogre in the matrix
        attackElm - char that represents Ogre's Club in the matrix

    • Method Detail

      • GenerateOgrePosition

        public char GenerateOgrePosition()
        Generate a Random move to the Ogre
        Returns:
        Returns the char that represents the generated move considering the WASD keys ( W - up, A - left, S - Down, D - right)

      • ChangeClub

        public int[] ChangeClub()
        Randomly generates the new Club's position considering as start point the actual Ogre's position
        Returns:
        Returns an int array with the new Club's matrix line at the 1st position (int[0]) and the new Club's matrix column at the 2nd position(int[1))

      • setClub

        public void setClub(int x,
                    int y)
        Sets the x and y club position with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        x - the new x position of the club
        y - the new y position of the club

      • setClubElm

        public void setClubElm(char element)
        Sets a new symbol to represent the club
        Parameters:
        element - the new char that represents a club in the map

      • setStopOgre

        public void setStopOgre(int times)
        Sets the counter time of when the ogre gets stuned by the hero to its given parameter
        Parameters:
        times - the new value of stopmove of ogre(ogre is going to be times time turns without moving if its stunned)

      • decStopOgre

        public void decStopOgre()
        Decrements by one de counter stopmove that defines that the ogre is stunned

      • getStopOgre

        public int getStopOgre()
        Gets the current value of the counter that defines the number of turns that the ogre is left to be stunned
        Returns:
        the stopmove variable

      • getClubElm

        public char getClubElm()
        Gets the current symbol that represents the club in the game map
        Returns:
        the attackElement variable of the ogre

      • getAttackX

        public int getAttackX()
        Gets the current x position of the ogre club attack
        Returns:
        the attackX variable

      • getAttackY

        public int getAttackY()
        Gets the current y position of the ogre club attack
        Returns:
        the attackY variable

      • verifyColision

        public boolean verifyColision(Character c)
        Compares if an ogre and the club attack is next to another Character and updates the ogre accordingly Checks if the Ogre is not stunned and then compares if the Character c is next to it , if so the the ogre is set to stunned accordingly Also checks if the character is next to the ogre attack club
        Overrides:
        verifyColision in class Character
        Parameters:
        c - character to compare to
        Returns:
        true the character c is next to the ogre club and false if the character is next to the ogre itself(ogre is stunned) or if the character is not near the ogre

      • updateSleep

        public boolean updateSleep()
        Updates the sleeping(stun) status of the ogre by updating the sleeping count timer, the ogre and club elements
        Returns:
        true if the ogre is still sleeping, false if the ogre is awake

      • update

        public boolean update(Map currentmap,
                      char guardmove)
        Updates the ogre and club positions by randomly simulating new movements until the new positions are valid (a max of 50 tries in case something goes wrong) Only updates the ogre ( or tries to) if the ogre is not stunned
        Overrides:
        update in class Character
        Parameters:
        currentmap - map to check if the new positions of the ogre are valid
        guardmove - char to represent the move set (irrelevent to the ogre)
        Returns:
        true if the ogre has been updated successfully

      • updateClub

        public void updateClub(Map currentmap)
        Updates the ogres club positions by randomly getting new adjacent positions to the ogre (after he moved) until the position is valid ( 50 tries atmost if something goes wrong) also updates the club symbol accordingly (in case it goes over a key, for example)
        Parameters:
        currentmap - map to check if the new club positions of the club are valid positions

      • addElementsMatrix

        public void addElementsMatrix(char[][] map)
        Adds the ogre club position into a map and the ogre itself
        Overrides:
        addElementsMatrix in class Character
        Parameters:
        map - matrix where the character symbol is set,represents the game map
